metadataAttributes.Title: Integrative Health and Medicine Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Launch your career in integrative health. Incorporate complementary therapies in clinical practice to improve outcomes and promote wellbeing.
metadataAttributes.Skills: wellbeing, patient-centered care, improved symptom management, integrative medicine, evidence-based practice, Evidence-Based Practices, complementary therapies, integrative nursing, symptom management, healthcare, Stress Management, Pain Management,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Robin Austin, DNP, DC ,Teri Verner, DNP, RN ,Susan Thompson, DNP ,Amy Taylor, MD ,Janet Tomaino, DNP ,Louise Delagran ,Alex Haley ,
